sentences.en: But, the intellectual property disturbance on exhibition is incessant however Yu Er.
sentences.cn: 但是, 展览会上的知识产权风波却不绝于耳.

sentences.en: Her incessant complaining is tiresome to everyone.
sentences.cn: 她没完没了的抱怨使每个人都厌烦.

sentences.en: Night and day we live with the incessant noise of the city.
sentences.cn: 无论白天还是黑夜,我们都生活在无休止的城市噪音中.

sentences.en: Osterman turned to the company , shaking hands all around, keeping up an incessant stream of conversation.
sentences.cn: 奥斯特曼朝大伙转过身来, 跟每个人都握了手, 一面嘴里滔滔不绝地说着话.

sentences.en: Quarrels and feuds between tribes became incessant.
sentences.cn: 部落间的争吵、反目成仇的事件接连不断.

sentences.en: She is tired of his incessant demands for affection.
sentences.cn: 她厌倦了他对感情的不断索取。

sentences.en: So, after three days of incessant byandy - drinking, he had burned out the youth from his blood.
sentences.cn: 就这样, 连续三天不断地暴饮白兰地, 他将自己血液中的青春活力都烧尽了.

sentences.en: Soldiers were restless to return home and complained of incessant boredom.
sentences.cn: 士兵们焦躁不安的返回家中并抱怨着持续乏味的生活.

sentences.en: The child’s incessant talking started to irritate her.
sentences.cn: 这孩子喋喋不休，她开始烦躁起来。

sentences.en: The incessant noise of the traffic gave us not a moment's peace.
sentences.cn: 交通车辆不停的喧闹声使我们得不到片刻安宁.

sentences.en: The pollard willows were tortured out of their natural shape by incessant choppings.
sentences.cn: 那一丛秃头的柳树,因不断遭受砍伐都失去了天然的形状.

sentences.en: There were other songs, which made incessant mention of " Jordan's banks ".
sentences.cn: 另外还有几首歌, 里面不断提到 “ 约旦河岸. ”

sentences.en: They agree to pass their lives in incessant slavery.
sentences.cn: 他们同意永远做牛做马.

sentences.en: This incessant rushing about is beginning to tell on you.
sentences.cn: 到处不停地乱跑开始影响你的健康了.

sentences.en: We felt put out by the guest's incessant requests.
sentences.cn: 客人不断的要求令我们觉得受打扰.

sentences.en: We have had incessant snowfall since yesterday afternoon.
sentences.cn: 从昨天下午开始就持续不断地下雪.

trans.tran_cn: 不停的，持续不断的，无尽无休
